title.rendered: James Hopwood joins Behavioral Health Group as Chief Financial Officer

content.rendered:
Chartwell Partners is pleased to announce that James Hopwood has been selected by Behavioral Health Group (BHG) to be their Chief Financial Officer.  Mr. Hopwood previously served as Chief Financial Officer for Adeptus Heath, Inc. and Promise Heathcare Group.

Founded in 2006, Behavioral Health Group (BHG) is a private equity-backed, leading provider of opioid addiction treatment services. With 54 locations in Colorado, Kansas, Kentucky, Louisiana, Missouri, Tennessee, Texas, North Carolina, South Carolina, Georgia, Virginia, Florida and Washington, DC. The Vistria Group is the lead investor.
